name: The Means of Destruction
description:
Made for Ludum Dare Oct 2022 in the Extra Category. Best played with the mouse. The theme is "Every 10 Seconds", although this game strayed far away from the theme. 

 You are a worker who just started a job at a factory. But there's more to the new gig than meets the eye...

Credits: 

Developed by Anna Krasner

Audio from the free Sonniss #GameAudioGDC Bundle
